title: Google\Cloud\Domains\V1alpha2\ConfigureContactSettingsRequest
name: ConfigureContactSettingsRequest
description:
Request for the ConfigureContactSettings method.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.domains.v1alpha2.ConfigureContactSettingsRequest

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.registration
params.description: Required. The name of the Registration whose contact settings are being updated, in the format projects/*/locations/*/registrations/*.

params.name: data.update_mask
params.description: Required. The field mask describing which fields to update as a comma-separated list. For example, if only the registrant contact is being updated, the update_mask is "registrant_contact".

params.name: data.contact_notices
params.description: The list of contact notices that the caller acknowledges. The notices needed here depend on the values specified in contact_settings.

params.name: data.validate_only
params.description: Validate the request without actually updating the contact settings.
